abstract: Analysts and industry observers appeared split on whether a rumor that Salesforce.com has approached Oracle about an $8.9 billion deal to sell itself to Larry Ellison’s firm may become a reality.
lead_paragraph: Analysts and industry observers appeared split on whether a rumor that Salesforce.com has approached Oracle about an $8.9 billion deal to sell itself to Larry Ellison’s firm may become a reality.

headline.main: Speculation in the Valley: Oracle’s Next Big Deal?
